#labels Featured

= Visual Settings =

|| *Setting* || *Description* || *Accepts* || *Example* ||
|| visual_background_color || Change the color of the background || Color name or hex code || '#FF0022' ||
|| visual_text_color || Change the text color || Color name or hex code || '#FF0022' ||
|| visual_zoom_bar_color || Change the color of the zoom bar || Color name or hex code || '#FF0022' ||
|| visual_bar_size || Size of horizontal bars || Number in pixels || '2' ||
|| visual_bar_color || Change the color of the horizontal bars || Color name or hex code || '#FF0022' ||
|| visual_thumb_border || Border for thumbnails || True or False || true ||
|| visual_thumb_border_color || Change the color of thumbnail borders || Color name or hex code || '#FF0022' ||
|| visual_folder_color || Change the background color of folders || Color name or hex code || '#FF0022' ||
|| visual_folder_border || Border for folders || True or False || true ||
|| visual_folder_border_color || Change the color of folder borders || Color name or hex code || '#FF0022' ||
|| thumbnail_text_size || Text size for thumbnails and folders || Number in pixels || 14 ||
|| thumbnail_text_font || Text font for thumbnails and folders || CSS font-family format || 'Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' ||

http://code.pixelizm.com/wp-content/code/visual_settings.png

= General Settings =

|| *Setting* || *Description* || *Accepts* || *Example* ||
|| thumbnail_gd || Use GDv2 for thumbnail generation || True or False || true ||
|| thumbnail_gd_cache || Cache GDv2 thumbnails in 'cache' folder inside current image directory || True or False || true ||
|| thumbnail_gd_expire || Cache expiry || In seconds || 200 or 60*60*24*2 (2 days) ||
|| thumbnail_size || Max size of thumbnails width or height (depending on which is larger) || Number in pixels || 150 ||
|| folder_size || Max size of folders || Number in pixels || 150 ||
|| thumbnail_file_type || Thumbnail file type when not using GDv2 || File extension || 'png' ||
|| thumbnail_filename || Show file name beneath thumbnails || True or False || true ||
|| thumbnail_directoryname || Show folder name beneath folders || True or False || true ||
|| page_override_header || Override standard header with another file || File path || 'includes/header.php' ||
|| page_override_footer || Override standard footer with another file || File path || 'includes/footer.php' ||
|| file_types || Which file types to index || File extension (array) || array('jpg', 'jpeg', 'png') ||
|| file_blacklist || Which files to not index || File name (array) || array('index.php') ||
|| dir_blacklist || Which directories to not index || Directory name (array) || array('.', '..', 'cache', 'thumbs') ||
